channel.title: Legacy 718 - PK Spawn w/ Summoning, Old & new armor looks & Nex armors
channel.description:
[img]http://im2.ezgif.com/tmp/ezgif-1588566435.gif[/img]
Welcome to Legacy 718 Advertisement. We are a PK Server, we offer
[ul][li]Full summoning, Pack Yack, Wolpertinger & Steel Titan.[/li] [li]All the Nex Armor sets[/li] [li]All bosses for compeditive PvM players[/li] [li]Full Kiln Minigame[/li] [li]Dominion Tower Minigame for Completionist Cape[/li] [li]And many more![/li][/ul]
[url=http://www.konsulent.org]www.konsulent.org[/url] - Website link [url=http://www.client.konsulent.org]www.client.konsulent.org[/url] - Client Download
New Armor looks. This is toggle-able. [img]http://i.imgur.com/IMXFITh.png[/img]
Old Armor Looks. This is toggle-able [img]http://i.imgur.com/RJR8pvo.png[/img]
Picture from the server was shutdown. [img]http://i.imgur.com/CfWbB41.png[/img]
Video from server. [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUMe4SVM0Ak[/youtube]
